answers.answer: Just wait to drink it at the office and have them do it right away. I actually went over my 1 hr mark a little, by then i was so hungry i started feeling nauseas and dizzy. Im suprised i didnt throw up. My test came back fine though no diabetes so dont worry too much about that it probably was the fasting.
Yeah i think so too... still feeling a bit weak now. Like all the energy came out of me

question: The lab tech had to cancel my 3 hour test cause i threw every thing up!:( i hope next time i dont. I wonder why that happend? I drank the orange drink then started to get light headed, nauseous, then got hot flashes and then i threw up... i guess its because of the fasting... i hope i dont throw up in my next one.
title: cancelled glucose test
